1.title: SPORTS QUOTES
clues: Told he'd tied this man with his 361st HR, Sammy Sosa asked, "That's the guy whose girlfriend was Marilyn Monroe?"

4.title: FERROUS, BUELLER

7.title: PLEAS & CARATS

Chief Pleas is the parliament of Sark, one of these islands between England & France

8.title: FAMOUS LAST WORDS
clues: A woman facing the guillotine, 1793:"Farewell, my children, I go to rejoin your father"

An admiral, 1805:"Thank God, I have done my duty"
